caption: This low quality audio features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. Strings play staccato notes in the background and at the end of the bar, the notes are allowed to ring. A synth plays chords using an organ voice. This voice plays chords in the background. At the end, the synth plays the sound of two bells playing a descending sequence. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
